scripts.build: yarn workspace @myideaswork/common run build; yarn workspace @myideaswork/backend run build; yarn workspace @myideaswork/frontend run build
scripts.frontend:build: npm run build --workspace @myideaswork/common ; npm run build --workspace @myideaswork/frontend
scripts.frontend: npm run build --workspace @myideaswork/common ; yarn workspace @myideaswork/frontend start
scripts.cache:clean: npx jest --showConfig | grep cache; rm -rf /tmp/jest_rs; rm -R backend/dist/; rm -R frontend/dist/; rm -R shared/dist/; yarn cache clean; rm -R node_modules/; rm -R frontend/node_modules/; rm -R backend/node_modules/;rm -R shared/node_modules/; rm yarn.lock; rm package-lock.json; rm backend/yarn.lock; rm backend/package-lock.json; rm frontend/yarn.lock; rm frontend/package-lock.json; rm shared/yarn.lock; rm shared/package-lock.json
scripts.backend: yarn workspace @myideaswork/common run build; yarn workspace @myideaswork/backend run build; yarn workspace @myideaswork/backend run start:dev
scripts.backend:deploy: yarn migration:run; yarn workspace @myideaswork/common run build; yarn workspace @myideaswork/backend run build
scripts.migration:run: yarn workspace @myideaswork/common run build & yarn workspace @myideaswork/backend run migration:run
scripts.migration:generate: yarn workspace @myideaswork/common run build & yarn workspace @myideaswork/backend run migration:generate ./src/migrations/update
